question: Lifetime gym..can I walk in a drop off a resume? How do I get a job at Lifetime Fitness?
question_content: I want to work at Lifetime Fitness and I have applied online. There is a note on their website that because of the number of applicants - one shouldn't follow up at the gyms.  I tried to find an email to send my application but i wasn't successful.  Any advise???  Thanks!!

answers.answer_content:
If it says that you shouldn't follow up at a gym, then don't. 
Looks like it is not an easy job to get, so in the meantime keep applying to other places. Once you get a job at any gym you'll have the experience and a better chance if you apply again.
